allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: SwimReader STDDS server

FAA SWIM SCDS client that connects to STDDS via Solace SMF, parses
real-time TAIS surveillance data, and serves it to DGScope via the
Dstars ScopeServer protocol \(newline-delimited JSON over HTTP streaming\).

- SwimReader.Core: Event bus, domain events, models
- SwimReader.Scds: Solace SMF connection to FAA SCDS over TLS
- SwimReader.Parsers: TAIS TATrackAndFlightPlan XML parser \(+ stubs for TDES, SMES, APDS, ISMC\)
- SwimReader.Server: DGScope-compatible Dstars streaming endpoint
- SwimReader.MessageCapture: Diagnostic tool for capturing raw SCDS messages

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix facility filtering, ground speed, LDR direction, and wake category

- Route track/flight plan updates only to clients subscribed to the
  matching facility, fixing DGScope showing no targets when facilities
  outside radar range were being broadcast to all clients
- Remove incorrect 4.55x velocity multiplier; TAIS vx/vy are already
  in knots \(vxRaw/vyRaw are the raw STARS units\)
- Parse leader line direction \(<lld>\) from TAIS XML and map compass
  directions to DGScope LDRDirection enum values for datablock offset
- Fix wake category parsing to use <category> element \(not <wakeCategory>\)
- Change Content-Type to application/json to match DGScope expectations
- Track facility in TrackStateManager for deletion routing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add frozen/pseudo track support for position-only display

Parse <frozen> and <pseudo> flags from TAIS XML. When either flag is
set, strip altitude, squawk, Mode S, speed, and callsign from the
DGScope JSON output so DGScope treats them as PrimaryOnly targets
\(diamond position symbol with no datablock\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
